forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

threads.title: progress on 'plate of submision'
threads.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

threads.title: progress on 'sheild of supremacy'
threads.latestCommentText: sheild will stay as it is as i move onto the 'thousand loop', will plan to write up my ideas on what it would have done though.

threads.title: progress on 'thousand loop plate'
threads.latestCommentText: most of the physical structure has been done. plan to add electric effect with shapes, plan to add rotating plate to phase through ring.

threads.title: rigel
threads.latestCommentText: been exploring the caves more lately, i recomended rigel check that area since making an artifact isn't the same as finding one. i dont want to spoil him or anything.

threads.title: noil
threads.latestCommentText: i realise theres probably not much reason to take him back, he seems fine and it's hard to keep him when i explore underground. i'll keep checking though.

threads.title: progress of 'rothich woods'
threads.latestCommentText: best solution, rebuild area using much less shapes for ground, trees are mostly fine. will do this when other areas are 'finished'.

threads.title: progress of 'archopal's home'
threads.latestCommentText: area is 'done' as far as i'm concerned for now, plans to clean build area are there. i'll return if i west m.path is next to build but not before others are finished.

threads.title: thoughts on anyland
threads.latestCommentText: a lot of people have pointed out how disapointed they are in philip and i can't pick sides here. no one outright wants him to stop though but there's lessons to be learned from it.

threads.title: livestream
threads.latestCommentText: i haven't livestreamed in a long time, i'd like to get back into it really but it takes a toll on me more than any desktop game or even live drawing. i do enjoy the pressure a bit?

threads.title: s.s.s.b.r.
threads.latestCommentText: i understand that everything is best left alone, it was an experiance and a nice memory of what everyone involved wanted to make in my area. i can be happy with what it is.

threads.title: what a clown
threads.latestCommentText: after all this time you never learn do you? all these distractions stopping you from finishing anything at all. you just made 2 new areas as well? what the hell is wrong with you?

threads.title: progress of 'ye old mountin path'
threads.latestCommentText: smaller plants added. minor unatural contruction added. progress paused until linking areas are created/updated.

threads.title: finally decided to make a board.
threads.latestCommentText: future plan for board: keep current world updates at the top. change design to feature '2d' art on the front (behind buttons).
